微软将从 2023 年底开始在 Windows 上关闭 Cortana https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-is-killing-cortana-on-windows-starting-late-2023/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 17:53:57 -0400塞尔吉乌加特兰Microsofthttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/microsoft-is-killing-cortana-on-windows-starting-late-2023/ After introducing a string of AI-powered assistants for its products, Microsoft has now announced that it will soon end support for the Windows standalone Cortana app. [...]
勒索软件周 - 2023 年 6 月 2 日 - Whodunit？ https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-june-2nd-2023-whodunit/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 17:47:03 -0400劳伦斯艾布拉姆斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-week-in-ransomware-june-2nd-2023-whodunit/ It has been a fairly quiet week regarding ransomware, with only a few reports released and no new significant attacks. However, we may have a rebrand in the making, and a ransomware operation is likely behind a new zero-day data-theft campaign, so we have some news to talk about. [...]
Windows 11 要求 SMB 签名以防止 NTLM 中继攻击https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/windows-11-to-require-smb-signing-to-prevent-ntlm-relay-attacks/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 14:22:33 -0400塞尔吉乌加特兰SecurityMicrosoft https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/windows-11-to-require-smb-signing-to-prevent-ntlm-relay-attacks/ Microsoft says SMB signing (aka security signatures) will be required by default for all connections to defend against NTLM relay attacks, starting with today's Windows build (Enterprise edition) rolling out to Insiders in the Canary Channel. 美国国家安全局和联邦调查局：Kimsuky 黑客冒充记者窃取情报https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/nsa-and-fbi-kimsuky-hackers-pose-as-journalists-to-steal-intel/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 14:07:06 -0400比尔图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/nsa-and-fbi-kimsuky-hackers-pose-as-journalists-to-steal-intel/ State-sponsored North Korean hacker group Kimsuky (a.ka. APT43) has been impersonating journalists and academics for spear-phishing campaigns to collect intelligence from think tanks, research centers, academic institutions, and various media organizations. Burton Snowboards 在 2 月攻击后披露数据泄露https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/burton-snowboards-discloses-data-breach-after-february-attack/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 12:19:20 -0400塞尔吉乌加特兰Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/burton-snowboards-discloses-data-breach-after-february-attack/ Leading snowboard maker Burton Snowboards confirmed notified customers of a data breach after some of their sensitive information was "potentially" accessed or stolen during what the company described in February as a "cyber incident." 已从 Web Store 移除安装量达 7500 万的恶意 Chrome 扩展程序https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malicious-chrome-extensions-with-75m-installs-removed-from-web-store/ Fri, 02 Jun 2023 09:19:45 -0400比尔图拉斯SecurityGoogle https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/malicious-chrome-extensions-with-75m-installs-removed-from-web-store/ Google has removed from the Chrome Web Store 32 malicious extensions that could alter search results and push spam or unwanted ads. Collectively, they come with a download count of 75 million. [...]
新的 Horabot 活动接管了受害者的 Gmail、Outlook 帐户https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-horabot-campaign-takes-over-victims-gmail-outlook-accounts/ Thu, 01 Jun 2023 16:54:40 -0400比尔图拉斯Securityhttps://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-horabot-campaign-takes-over-victims-gmail-outlook-accounts/ A previously unknown campaign involving the Hotabot botnet malware has targeted Spanish-speaking users in Latin America since at least November 2020, infecting them with a banking trojan and spam tool. 俄罗斯称美国在 iOS 零点击攻击中入侵了数千部 iPhone https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/russia-says-us-hacked-thousands-of-iphones-in-ios-zero-click-attacks/ Thu, 01 Jun 2023 12:11:28 -0400比尔图拉斯SecurityAppleMobile https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/russia-says-us-hacked-thousands-of-iphones-in-ios-zero-click-attacks/ Russian cybersecurity firm Kaspersky says some iPhones on its network were hacked using an iOS vulnerability that installed malware via iMessage zero-click exploits. Russia blames these attacks on US intelligence agencies. [...]
谷歌将 Chrome 沙盒转义链漏洞利用奖励提高三倍https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/google-triples-rewards-for-chrome-sandbox-escape-chain-exploits/ Thu, 01 Jun 2023 12:00:00 -0400塞尔吉乌加特兰GoogleSecurity https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/google/google-triples-rewards-for-chrome-sandbox-escape-chain-exploits/ Google announced today that bug bounty hunters who report sandbox escape chain exploits targeting its Chrome web browser are now eligible for triple the standard reward until December 1st, 2023.
